title: 50 First Dates
short_plot_summary: A marine veterinarian falls in love with a woman who has short-term memory loss, leading to daily challenges as he must make her fall in love with him every day.
explanation: An island, representing the movie's setting in Hawaii
A woman scientist, representing Lucy who is an artist and has short-term memory loss
A calendar, symbolizing the daily challenge to make Lucy fall in love
A ship, representing the Sea Life Park where Henry works as a marine veterinarian
A penguin, referencing the animals in the Sea Life Park and Lucy's favorite, Willy the penguin
